short_summary: Hiring of Realtors and Marketers in Real Property Services
description: Ongoing opportunity to qualify suppliers, supplying real estate agents and marketing companies.
duration_in_months: We will utilize the extension option and then subsequently end the contract on 2034-07-12T14:00:00
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement

**Tender Title**
* English: Hiring of Realtors and Marketers in Real Property Services
* French: Embauche d’agents immobiliers et de spécialistes du marketing en services immobiliers

**Reference Number**
* WS4379612558-Doc4395133405

**Amendment Number**
* 6

**Solicitation Number**
* WS4379612558

**Publication Date**
* January 16, 2024

**Tender Closing Date**
* July 12, 2024, 2PM EDT

**Expected Contract Start Date**
* March 31, 2024

**Expected Contract End Date**
* March 30, 2027

**Tender Status**
* This tender has expired.

**Procurement Category**
* Service (SRV)

**Notice Type**
* Request for Supply Arrangement (RFA)

**Procurement Method**
* Competitive - Open bidding

**Trade Agreements**
* The tender is subject to the Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA), Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP), Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA), Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA), World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA), and Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA).

**Regions of Opportunity**
* None

**Regions of Delivery**
* Canada

**Contracting Entity**
* Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)

**Contact Information**
* Michel Sader, SPAC/PSPC
* Email: [michel.sader@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:michel.sader@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

**Notice URL**
* https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18518540?extsite=MTg1MTg1NDBfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

**Tender Description**
This is an ongoing opportunity for suppliers to qualify and submit an arrangement to provide real estate services, including the hiring of real estate agents and marketing companies. The expected period
